000010 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
101001 00001 00000 0000000000000000     # sw $r1 $r0 0  # memory[0] = $r1
100111 00000 00010 0000000000000000     # lw $r0 $r2 0  # $r2 = memory[0]
111111 00010  000000000000000000001     # asrt $r2 1

000010 00000 00011 0000000000000101     # addi $r0 $r3 5
101001 00011 00000 0000000000000100     # sw $r3 $r0 4  # memory[1] = $r3
100111 00000 00100 0000000000000100     # lw $r0 $r4 4  # $r4 = memory[1]
111111 00100  000000000000000000101     # asrt $r4 5

000010 00000 00101 0000000000001000     # addi $r0 $r5 8
000010 00000 00110 0000000000001010     # addi $r0 $r6 10
101001 00110 00101 0000000000000100     # sw $r6 $r5 4  # memory[3] = $r6
100111 00101 00111 0000000000000100     # lw $r5 $r7 1  # $r7 = memory[3]
111111 00111  000000000000000001010     # asrt $r7 10

# 101001 00000 00000 1111111111111100   # out of range

111100 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
